document.Are you sure you want to delete this doc: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce document ?
document.Do you want to start the OCR process for: Voulez-vous lancer le processus d'OCR pour toutes les pages de ce document ?
document.Starts layout analysis for every page: Lance l'analyse de la mise en page pour chaque page

document-layout-analysis.Choose a layout: Choisir un moteur d'analyse de mise en page

document-list.Are you sure you want to delete this doc: Etes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce document et toutes ses pages ?

progress.Layout Analysis: Analyse de la mise en page

page-list.Are you sure you want to delete this pag: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cette page ?
page-list.OCR task has been started for the select: La tâche d'OCR a été lancée pour la page sélectionnée.
page-list.Translation task has been started for th: La tâche de traduction a été lancée pour la page sélectionnée
page-list.Target language cannot be the same as th: La langue cible ne peut pas être la même que la langue source.
page-list.Translation is not possible when no over: La traduction n'est pas possible si aucun transparent n'est disponible. Téléchargez une superposition ou effectuez l'OCR de la page.
page-list.No overlay available. Upload an overlay: Aucune superposition disponible. Téléchargez une superposition ou effectuez une reconnaissance optique de la page en premier.
page-list.View page overlay: Afficher la superposition de la page
page-list.View full-size page: Afficher la page en taille réelle
page-list.to see translation memory configuration: pour voir la configuration de la mémoire de traduction.
page-list.These buttons have actions on the docume: These buttons have actions on the document level
page-list.refreshes the states of the document and: refreshes the states of the document and its pages
page-list.starts the layout engine analysis for al: starts the layout engine analysis for all the pages of the document
page-list.deletes the document with all its pages: deletes the document with all its pages
page-list.All the pages that you have uploaded wil: All the pages that you have uploaded will appear here
page-list.You can scroll down the list if you have: You can scroll down the list if you have more than two pages
page-list.Click on a page to view your page and al: Click on a page to view your page and all its information.

help.Cannot connect to Confluence: Impossible de se connecter à Confluence.

tour.This is a table with all your documents: Voici un tableau avec tous vos documents.
tour.At the first glance, it should look pret: Au premier coup d'oeil, il devrait sembler assez vide.
tour.When you created documents, you can alwa: Lorsque vous avez créé des documents, vous pouvez toujours y accéder en cliquant sur les titres.
tour.The table is paginated, and a search but: Le tableau est paginé, et un bouton de recherche dans la navigation vous permet de rechercher des documents
tour.By pressing this button you can create a: En appuyant sur ce bouton, vous pouvez créer un nouveau document.

document-add.A document is a collection of pages/imag: A document is a collection of pages/images
document-add.Here you can fill in a title for your ne: Here you can fill in a title for your new document
document-add.A summary of your document, for your own: A summary of your document, for your own reference
document-add.When you have filled in the information: When you have filled in the information of your document, you can press this button to proceed to the next step.
Les informations du document sont sauvegardées.

layout.In this step you can select which model: In this step you can select which model you wish to use for the layout analysis (OCR)
layout.Depending on your documents and the sele: Depending on your documents and the selected engine, the layout analysis results might be different

page-add.button to select images or PDF files tha: button to select images or PDF files that you wish to add to your document.
page-add.All pages in a PDF file will automatical: All pages in a PDF file will automatically be converted to images.
page-add.Documents will automatically be uploaded: Documents will automatically be uploaded once you selected them from your system.
page-add.When you have selected all your pages, y: When you have selected all your pages, you can press this button to proceed to the next step.
page-add.Page(s) have been uploaded: La ou les pages ont été téléchargées.

page-leaflet.In this interactive view your selected p: In this interactive view your selected page will be presented.
page-leaflet.When the layout analysis has completed,: When the layout analysis has completed, you can see blue boxes around the text in the page.
page-leaflet.By hovering these boxes, a popup will ap: By hovering these boxes, a popup will appear which contains the plain text that has been recognized by the OCR.
page-leaflet.By clicking on these, it will automatica: By clicking on these, it will automatically zoom in to your text.
page-leaflet.You can zoom in or out with your scroll: You can zoom in or out with your scroll wheel, and drag the screen to move in your page.
page-leaflet.You can click on the tabs to change the: You can click on the tabs to change the view and see other kinds of information about your page.
page-leaflet.Text view of your page. Only works after: Text view of your page. Only works after layout analysis.
page-leaflet.Metadata of your page from the document: Metadata of your page from the document classifier.
page-leaflet.History of actions done on your page: History of actions done on your page.
page-leaflet.Switch between the available languages o: Switch between the available languages of your page.
page-leaflet.If the desired language is not present,: If the desired language is not present, use the context menu to translate your page.
